body.content:
Hello!

I hope you had a great weekend? This is a reminder that we have
resolved in finding a perfect solution to your delayed inheritance /
Compensation payment valued sum of $950,000.00 (Nine Hundred Fifty
Thousand Dollars) and as you may know, we have arranged your payment
to be paid to you through an ATM Master Card and this will be issued
on your name and shall be posted directly to your address via DHL or
any courier services available in your country. Upon your contact with
us, the sum of $950,000.00 (Nine Hundred Fifty Thousand Dollars)  will
be credited into the ATM Master Card and this will enable you to
withdraw your funds in any ATM Machine in your country with a minimum
withdrawal of  $10,000.00 per day. Your limit can be increased to any
amount upon your request.

In this regards, you are to contact us via
( barris12345@yahoo.com) and furnish the requested
information to the directorate of international payment and transfer
with the followings;

1. Your name:
2. Country:
3. Age and sex:
4. Occupation:
5. Mobile telephone:
6. Delivery address:
7. Id card identification:

We require your urgent response to this email as directed to avoid
further delay.
Public information office
